definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
Garab Dorje Rinpoche, succession of Buthanese religious leaders
pinyin: Ga2 la1 · Duo1 jie2 · Ren2 bo1 qie4

sentences.english: And Rinpoche has vowed to turn off the water while brushing his teeth.
sentences.chinese: 仁波切本身則誓言在刷牙時要關閉水龍頭。

sentences.english: Anyone who would like to request teachings from Rinpoche, kindly register early for a private interview.
sentences.chinese: 如需向仁波切請法，請預先報名以便通知。

sentences.english: Also, presently, ah Tenga Rinpoche is also here.
sentences.chinese: 還有，現在天噶仁波切也在這裏。

sentences.english: Rinpoche also stressed the importance of carrying the mirror-mind into the dream and deep sleep states.
sentences.chinese: 仁波切地強調夢境與深睡狀態中的明鏡之心。

sentences.english: Samdhong Rinpoche won with 90 percent of the votes.
sentences.chinese: 桑東仁波切獲得90%的選票當選。

sentences.english: Kyabje Dorzong Rinpoche was born in early summer, at sunrise.
sentences.chinese: 德頌仁波切出生於初夏的日出時分。

sentences.english: About ten minutes later, Rinpoche called me again.
sentences.chinese: 大約在10分鐘後，仁波切再度打電話給我。

sentences.english: Rinpoche himself chanted the scripture featured in the video.
sentences.chinese: 經文由丁真俄色仁波切親自唱誦。

sentences.english: Therefore Rinpoche thought Nhangka Ningpo as no ordinary boy.
sentences.chinese: 仁波切當時大感驚異，認爲他必是一位不尋常的人。

sentences.english: Chogyam Trungpa Rinpoche was a pioneer and igniter of Buddhadharma in the West.
sentences.chinese: 邱陽創巴仁波切是將佛法傳至西方的先驅者和燃火者。

sentences.english: The meaning of Rinpoche is literally a precious rare jewel, Mani or Ratna.
sentences.chinese: 仁波切就字面上的解釋是一種珍貴且稀少的寶石。

sentences.english: We make prayers for him to continue to turn the wheel of Dharma and for him to live long.
sentences.chinese: 我們爲了仁波切的長壽和能夠繼續轉法輪而祈禱。

sentences.english: Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche was a pioneer and igniter of Buddhadharma in the West.
sentences.chinese: 邱陽創巴仁波切是將佛法傳至西方的先驅者和燃火者。

sentences.english: Still, I was not able to hear Rinpoche's message .
sentences.chinese: 但是，我仍舊無法聽懂仁波切所要說的事。

sentences.english: I frantically sent several emails to Rinpoche again, requesting him to help TM.
sentences.chinese: 我瘋狂地連發多封電郵給仁波切，請求他幫助TM。

sentences.english: Rinpoche also told me that he had to do a Phowa for TM immediately.
sentences.chinese: 仁波切也告訴我他得隨即爲TM修頗瓦法。

definition: Living Buddha/title of Mongolian Lamas from 17th century
Buddhist teacher (Sanskrit transliteration)/also written 阿闍梨|阿阇梨[a1 she2 li2]
lama, spiritual teacher in Tibetan Buddhism
Tsongkhapa (1357-1419), Tibetan religious leader, founder of the Gelugpa school 格魯派|格鲁派[Ge2 lu3 pai4]
Geju (Tibetan: transmit word of Buddha) sect of Tibetan Buddhist
Panchen (Lama)/abbr. for 班禪額爾德尼|班禅额尔德尼[Ban1 chan2 E2 er3 de2 ni2]
Buddha (a person who has attained Buddhahood, or specifically Siddhartha Gautama)
Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha)/Buddhist doctrine
